sqlMap.select: SELECT a.* , b.link_name , b.link_address , b.link_telephone , b.link_mobilephone , b.link_area , b.link_memo, f.para_name AS creditlevel_name FROM T_Cm_Servicer a LEFT JOIN dbo.T_Cm_Link b ON a.link_id = b.id LEFT JOIN dbo.T_Cm_Code f ON f.para_value = a.credit_level AND para_type = 'customer_credit' where $and{id = #id#} $and{name like '%$name$%'} $and{code = #code#} $and{customer_level = #customer_level#} $and{link_id = #link_id#} $and{credit_level = #credit_level#} $and{is_stop = #is_stop#} $and{b.link_name like '%$link_name$%'} $and{b.link_address like '%$link_address$%'}
sqlMap.update: update T_Cm_Servicer set id=#id# ,name=#name# ,code=#code# ,customer_level=#customer_level# ,link_id=#link_id# ,credit_level=#credit_level# ,is_stop=#is_stop# WHERE id = #id#
sqlMap.delete: delete FROM T_Cm_Servicer WHERE id IN(#ids#)
